EmailTemplate.name: 201807_Global_Email_GoDirectCabin_Webinar_TM.201807_Global_Email_GoDirectCabin_W
EmailTemplate.subject: Video Streaming Your Passengers Crave – Honeywell – Webinar Follow-up
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]>
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=customer}},
Thank you for registering for the recent webinar Stream Video, Watch Live TV and Download Large Files on your Aircraft without Exceeding your Budget. <[[https://youtu.be/ScjFs_tnwyo]]>
Are your passengers asking for video streaming on your aircraft?
Give them the fast and reliable connectivity they want without breaking the bank. Honeywell’s GoDirect™ Cabin connectivity has tools, services and applications that dramatically reduce the cost of in-flight video streaming while letting you the control data usage.
Get data plans that start as low as $8,500 a month and still deliver the quality experience your passengers crave.
Let Honeywell save you up to $100,000 per aircraft annually with GoDirect Cabin. Upgrade to GoDirect today.
GET STARTED <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/service-listing/godirect-cabin]]>
If you missed the webinar, the replay is available HERE <[[https://youtu.be/ScjFs_tnwyo]]>
